Class DataTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataTable

  • public class DataTable
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    scottfloam and pratikkarnik

    Data Table

    The DataTable holds Variable(s) at a Site. All Site(s) have a DataTable that holds even Variables (x2, x4, x6, x8, x10, x12, x14, x16, x18, x20). Odd variables (x1, x3, x5, x7, x9, x11, x13, x15, x17, x19) are not replicated, and are found only at a site location equivalent to ((1 + index) mod 10).
